    A collection of methods for using the hook weapon.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • use

        public static void use(org.bukkit.event.entity.ProjectileLaunchEvent event)
        Handles a hook launch and cancels it, when no target was found within 15 blocks. Pulls the player to the targeted block and makes the hook loose 12 durability, if they are sneaking. Otherwhise tries to pulls the nearest entity, in line of sight, to the player.
        Parameters:
        event - The projectile event.
        See Also:
        pull(Block, ProjectileLaunchEvent), DurabilityCalculator.damageItem(Player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack, int, boolean)

      • pull

        private static boolean pull(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                            org.bukkit.event.entity.ProjectileLaunchEvent event)
        Searches the block for valid attack targets. If a target was found, the target will be pulled to the player.
        Parameters:
        block - The block to search for targets.
        event - The projectile event.
        Returns:
        If a target was found.
        See Also:
        SkillUtils.getVectorForPoints(Location, Location), DurabilityCalculator.damageItem(Player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack, boolean)
